SEARCH
Package game.enums

Enum Class SoundGroups

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<SoundGroups>
game.enums.SoundGroups
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<SoundGroups>, Constable
public enum SoundGroups extends Enum<SoundGroups>
An enum which represents the different sound groups. Is used to control the volume of the sound in batches.

  • Nested Class Summary
